QuestData.Title: Those Aren't Masks
QuestData.Description: $n, there are demon squids out there that are eating gilblins' heads and then taking them over! They better not come in here!$B$BThink you could swim out northwest onto Deepfin Ridge or into the Sira'kess Front and bring me back some of those Merciless things? Preferably dead, I think.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, they're ugly, but they mostly look harmless. Mostly. They're almost cute in a way.$B$BHere, let me clean the gilblin stuff out of these. I've got an idea....
